verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> of the desert יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea כְּסוּפ֤וֹת <S%H5492><s%> As whirlwinds בַּנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> in the south לַֽחֲלֹ֔ף <S%H2498><s%> pass מִמִּדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> from the desert בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> through [so] it cometh מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land נוֹרָאָֽה׃ <S%H3372><s%> from a terrible

חָז֥וּת <S%H2380><s%> vision קָשָׁ֖ה <S%H7186><s%> A grievous הֻגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> is declared לִ֑י הַבּוֹגֵ֤ד ׀ <S%H898><s%> unto me the treacherous dealer בּוֹגֵד֙ <S%H898><s%> dealeth treacherously וְהַשּׁוֹדֵ֣ד ׀ <S%H7703><s%> and the spoiler שׁוֹדֵ֔ד <S%H7703><s%> spoileth עֲלִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> Go up עֵילָם֙ <S%H5867><s%> O Elam צוּרִ֣י <S%H6696><s%> besiege מָדַ֔י <S%H4074><s%> O Media כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אַנְחָתָ֖ה <S%H585><s%> all the sighing הִשְׁבַּֽתִּי׃ <S%H7673><s%> thereof have I made to cease

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> this מָלְא֤וּ <S%H4390><s%> filled מָתְנַי֙ <S%H4975><s%> Therefore are my loins חַלְחָלָ֔ה <S%H2479><s%> with pain צִירִ֣ים <S%H6735><s%> pangs אֲחָז֔וּנִי <S%H270><s%> have taken hold כְּצִירֵ֖י <S%H6735><s%> upon me as the pangs יֽוֹלֵדָ֑ה <S%H3205><s%> of a woman that travaileth נַעֲוֵ֣יתִי <S%H5753><s%> I was bowed down מִשְּׁמֹ֔עַ <S%H8085><s%> at the hearing נִבְהַ֖לְתִּי <S%H926><s%> [of it] I was dismayed מֵרְאֽוֹת׃ <S%H7200><s%> at the seeing

תָּעָ֣ה <S%H8582><s%> panted לְבָבִ֔י <S%H3824><s%> My heart פַּלָּצ֖וּת <S%H6427><s%> fearfulness בִּֽעֲתָ֑תְנִי <S%H1204><s%> affrighted אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> נֶ֣שֶׁף <S%H5399><s%> me the night חִשְׁקִ֔י <S%H2837><s%> of my pleasure שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> hath he turned לִ֖י לַחֲרָדָֽה׃ <S%H2731><s%> into fear

עָרֹ֧ךְ <S%H6186><s%> Prepare הַשֻּׁלְחָ֛ן <S%H7979><s%> the table צָפֹ֥ה <S%H6823><s%> spread הַצָּפִ֖ית <S%H6823><s%> spread אָכ֣וֹל <S%H398><s%> eat שָׁתֹ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> drink ק֥וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> arise הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> ye princes מִשְׁח֥וּ <S%H4886><s%> [and] anoint מָגֵֽן׃ <S%H4043><s%> the shield פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> For thus hath the Lord לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go הַעֲמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> set הַֽמְצַפֶּ֔ה <S%H6822><s%> a watchman אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what יִרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> what he seeth יַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> let him declare

וְרָ֣אָה <S%H7200><s%> And he saw רֶ֗כֶב <S%H7393><s%> a chariot צֶ֚מֶד <S%H6776><s%> [with] a couple פָּֽרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6571><s%> of horsemen רֶ֥כֶב <S%H7393><s%> a chariot חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2543><s%> of asses רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> [and] a chariot גָּמָ֑ל <S%H1581><s%> of camels וְהִקְשִׁ֥יב <S%H7181><s%> and he hearkened קֶ֖שֶׁב <S%H7182><s%> diligently רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> with much קָֽשֶׁב׃ <S%H7182><s%> heed

וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> And he cried אַרְיֵ֑ה <S%H738><s%> A lion עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Then מִצְפֶּ֣ה ׀ <S%H4707><s%> upon the watchtower אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> My lord אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I עֹמֵ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> I stand תָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> continually יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> in the daytime וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מִ֨שְׁמַרְתִּ֔י <S%H4931><s%> in my ward אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> and I נִצָּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> and I am set כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> whole nights

וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> now behold זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> here בָא֙ <S%H935><s%> And behold here cometh רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> a chariot אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of men צֶ֖מֶד <S%H6776><s%> [with] a couple פָּֽרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> of horsemen וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> And he answered וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said נָפְלָ֤ה <S%H5307><s%> is fallen נָֽפְלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> is fallen בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> Babylon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all פְּסִילֵ֥י <S%H6456><s%> and all the graven images אֱלֹהֶ֖יהָ <S%H430><s%> of her gods שִׁבַּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> he hath broken לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> unto the ground

מְדֻשָׁתִ֖י <S%H4098><s%> O my threshing וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and the corn גָּרְנִ֑י <S%H1637><s%> of my floor אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> What שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> that which I have heard מֵאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִגַּ֥דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> have I declared לָכֶֽם׃ ס

מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden דּוּמָ֑ה <S%H1746><s%> of Dumah אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about קֹרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> He calleth מִשֵּׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> to me out of Seir שֹׁמֵר֙ <S%H8104><s%> Watchman מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how מִלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night שֹׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> Watchman מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how מִלֵּֽיל׃ <S%H3915><s%> night

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said שֹׁמֵ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> The watchman אָתָ֥ה <S%H857><s%> cometh בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> The morning וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and also the night אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּבְעָי֥וּן <S%H1158><s%> if ye will enquire בְּעָ֖יוּ <S%H1158><s%> enquire שֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ye return אֵתָֽיוּ׃ <S%H857><s%> come ס

מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden בַּעְרָ֑ב <S%H6152><s%> upon Arabia בַּיַּ֤עַר <S%H3293><s%> In the forest בַּעְרַב֙ <S%H6152><s%> in Arabia תָּלִ֔ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> shall ye lodge אֹֽרְח֖וֹת <S%H736><s%> O ye travelling companies דְּדָנִֽים׃ <S%H1720><s%> of Dedanim

לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7125><s%> to him צָמֵ֖א <S%H6771><s%> that was thirsty הֵתָ֣יוּ <S%H857><s%> brought מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> water יֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> The inhabitants אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land תֵּימָ֔א <S%H8485><s%> of Tema בְּלַחְמ֖וֹ <S%H3899><s%> with their bread קִדְּמ֥וּ <S%H6923><s%> they prevented נֹדֵֽד׃ <S%H5074><s%> him that fled

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from חֲרָב֖וֹת <S%H2719><s%> the swords נָדָ֑דוּ <S%H5074><s%> For they fled מִפְּנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> from חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> sword נְטוּשָׁ֗ה <S%H5203><s%> the drawn וּמִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> and from קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bow דְּרוּכָ֔ה <S%H1869><s%> the bent וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> and from כֹּ֥בֶד <S%H3514><s%> the grievousness מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> of war ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֛ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> said אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> For thus hath the Lord אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about בְּע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> In שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> unto me Within a year כִּשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> according to the years שָׂכִ֔יר <S%H7916><s%> of an hireling וְכָלָ֖ה <S%H3615><s%> shall fail כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and all the glory קֵדָֽר׃ <S%H6938><s%> of Kedar

וּשְׁאָ֧ר <S%H7605><s%> And the residue מִסְפַּר־ <S%H4557><s%> of the number קֶ֛שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> of archers גִּבּוֹרֵ֥י <S%H1368><s%> the mighty men בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children קֵדָ֖ר <S%H6938><s%> of Kedar יִמְעָ֑טוּ <S%H4591><s%> shall be diminished כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken ס
